summary: Shiza is the nickname of a 15-year-old boy. Money, power, and women - he has none of these, yet, in his young life. But, he does have the illegal, underground circuit of bare-knuckle ... See full summary »
cast: Oldzhas Nusupbayev|Olga Landina|Eduard Tabishev|Viktor Sukhorukov|Gulnara Yeraliyeva|Hurtaj Kanagat|Khorabek Musabayev|Bakhytbek Bajmukhanbetov|Mukhit Izimov|Gajratdzhan Tokhgibakiyev|Emine Ismailova|Dzhasulan Makhanov|Isabel Naveira
title: Shiza
